solution_line_template: The second bus is carrying {first_bus_people} * {multiplier_second_bus} = <<{first_bus_people}*{multiplier_second_bus}={second_bus_people}>>{second_bus_people} people.
The fourth bus has {first_bus_people} + {more_than_first_bus} = <<{first_bus_people}+{more_than_first_bus}={fourth_bus_people}>>{fourth_bus_people} people on it.

In total, there are {first_bus_people} + {second_bus_people} + {third_bus_people} + {fourth_bus_people} = <<{first_bus_people}+{second_bus_people}+{third_bus_people}+{fourth_bus_people}={total_people}>>{total_people} people on the buses.
